title: How do I install, manage, and uninstall applications?
answer: [ Installing applications]() precondition： go to Setting> Security>Unknown source. Method 1：download from Play Store and install. Method 2：Copy the apk files to your phone or SD card. Go to Manage Files , select the apk file>click Install  Manage applications Go to Setting> Mange APPs， touch All， touch any tab to go on operation of the application.  Uninstalling applications Go to setting> Manage APPs，Select the applications you want to uninstall, Touch Uninstall > OK
